page.title: 14interesting people
page.content: Interesting people.... We were fortunate to be able to interview two people who have lived and worked in Tai'rgwaith for a long time. Mrs.M.Bochert, was born in Tai'rgwaith but spent many years in the USA. She returned to Tai'rgwaith in 1963 and has worked hard to improve our village Two years ago she became the mayoress for the area. She lived opposite the school and remembers it as being much bigger than it is today. there were seven classes then and you had to pass an examination to go to the local grammar school in Ystalyfera. She enjoyed riding the horses which grazed on the local common; there were no fences then.
